rule.description: Add User Multi-value Permission values to Operation Data(normal add)
Check if any Permission attributes have remove-all-values so that full reconciliation is done
Add User Multi-value Permission values to Operation Data while migrate
Add User Multi-value Permission values to Operation Data on Modify events
Check if the entitlements-assignments are already done as part of sync in etp
Add Group Multi-value User assignments to Operation Data
Remove ALL entitlements if AD account deleted
